## Request for Proposal: Night Vision Systems for RCMP in New Brunswick
### Solicitation Number: 202501587

## Background
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the supply of four (4) night vision systems to be delivered to New Brunswick.

## Technical Requirements
The systems must be delivered on or before January 15, 2025. The delivery includes four (4) initial units, with the option to purchase additional items on or before March 31, 2026.

## Evaluation Criteria
The following criteria will be used in the evaluation process:

* Compliance with the bid solicitation requirements
* Meeting of mandatory technical evaluation criteria
* Price evaluation

## Tender Information

* Solicitation Start Date: 2024-11-14
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2024-12-03T13:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-12-06
* Expected Contract End Date: 2026-03-31
* Contact Person: Rosalee Parsons, RCMP
* Contact Information:
	+ Email: rosalee.parsons@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (902) 720-5112
	+ Address: 80 Garland Avenue, Dartmouth, Nova Scotia, B3B 0J8

## Procurement Details
This tender is open to all qualified suppliers. Bidders are required to submit their proposal electronically to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at ATL_Bid_Receiving@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. All documents related to this tender can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website.

## Important Notes
* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Indigenous businesses are encouraged to participate. Please visit [Canada.ca](https://canada.ca) for more information on the federal Indigenous Business Directory.
* The Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada applies to this procurement. Further information is available on the GETS website.

Tender documents can be downloaded from the following links:
